mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, LEVEL AS MENU_LEVEL, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF LEAF, MENU_ORDER, MENU_NAME, URL, IS_ACCESS_DENIED FROM (SELECT T1.MENU_CODE, URL, MENU_NAME, MENU_ORDER, IS_ACCESS_DENIED, IS_ACCESS_DENIED_NOT_PRINTED, PARENT_MENU_CODE FROM MENU T1, MENU_AVAILABLE_BY_POSITION T2 WHERE T1.MENU_CODE = T2.MENU_CODE AND T1.WORKPLACE_CODE = #{workplaceCode} AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode} AND IS_ACCESS_DENIED_NOT_PRINTED IS NULL ) START WITH PARENT_MENU_CODE IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CODE = PARENT_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY MENU_ORDER ) WHERE ( MENU_LEVEL = 3 ) OR ( MENU_LEVEL = 2 AND LEAF = 0 ) OR ( MENU_LEVEL = 2 AND LEAF = 1 AND URL IS NOT NULL ) OR ( MENU_LEVEL = 1 AND LEAF = 0 ) OR MENU_ORDER =0 ORDER BY NO
